title: JackMazzoni
author: JackMazzoni
content: Need Programmer who can help me on solving errors in Hashcat.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: JackMazzoni on August 28, 2023, 11:16:39 PMNeed Programmer who can help me on solving errors in Hashcat.There is a low chance of getting a good response for the post you are trying to hire for. You can get a good solution for the post you are trying to hire for on the freelance marketplace e.g.: freelaner.com and/or upwork.com and many other freelance marketplaces.

comments.author: JackMazzoni
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on August 29, 2023, 08:54:19 PMQuote from: JackMazzoni on August 28, 2023, 11:16:39 PMNeed Programmer who can help me on solving errors in Hashcat.There is a low chance of getting a good response for the post you are trying to hire for. You can get a good solution for the post you are trying to hire for on the freelance marketplace e.g.: freelaner.com and/or upwork.com and many other freelance marketplaces. Thank you for your suggestion. I will try posting on upwork and in freelancer.com.

comments.author: tinyteapot
comments.body: Quote from: JackMazzoni on August 28, 2023, 11:16:39 PMNeed Programmer who can help me on solving errors in Hashcat.Can you be more specific with the kind of errors you are getting and what algorithm you are trying to run.I might be able to assist you.

comments.author: JackMazzoni
comments.body: Quote from: tinyteapot on September 01, 2023, 06:42:10 PMQuote from: JackMazzoni on August 28, 2023, 11:16:39 PMNeed Programmer who can help me on solving errors in Hashcat.Can you be more specific with the kind of errors you are getting and what algorithm you are trying to run.I might be able to assist you.Hashcat does not support blockchain v0 wallets. The module_12700.c need a little tweaking for it to solve v0 wallets.https://github.com/hashcat/hashcat/issues/3820
